title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles model weights, config & data into a single Modelfile; ships Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & 30+ others with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client & async SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list models with native typing.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python lib, zero native deps.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama chat & embedding interfaces as first-class LangChain LLM & Embeddings classes.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (React) for Ollama: chat folders, model manager, code highlighting, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with tab completion, conversation history, markdown rendering & prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into inline Copilot-style code completions & chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama server & models on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity & autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as Generators & Embedders in Haystack 2.0 pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Lightweight Java SDK for Ollama; synchronous & async APIs, POJO model mapping, Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST endpoints; supports streaming chat, embeddings & model management.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Ready-to-run docker-compose stack bundling Ollama, Open-WebUI, Postgres & nginx for easy local deployment.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Official nixpkgs derivation for Ollama; reproducible builds on macOS & Linux with CUDA & ROCm variants.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama; strongly-typed models, dependency-injection friendly, NuGet package.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spins up ephemeral Ollama containers to run model tests & benchmarks.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit chat UI; runs fully local.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot that exposes Ollama chat & image generation to Discord channels with per-user rate limits.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app for Ollama; threaded conversations, slash commands, private channels & model switching.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-powered note Q&A, summarization & template prompts inside the editor.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin integrating Ollama for block-level summarization, translation & semantic search.
